resource.title: Counterfeit Currency Security Guide
resource.description: High-resolution visual poster showing how to detect counterfeit currency through tilt tests, tactile checks, and watermark verification.
resource.painPoint: High-quality fake notes in circulation (especially 1000 THB and 500 INR) can cause immediate financial loss.
keyFeatures: Visual "Tilt" Tests: Showing color-shifting ink and security threads
Tactile Checks: Where to feel for intaglio (raised) printing
Watermark & Window Checks: Hidden details visible against light

specifics: Bleed lines and security thread checks
